name: Demonic Manor 2 - Horror game
description:
Famous paranormal occurrence researcher, YouTuber Erkan hit the road in the midnight to investigate the so-called "haunted" female dormitory. Rumor has it, some female students joined a summoning ritual and worked on an evil being's infestation. The Director of the dorm is lost for 2 years. From now on, it is Erkan's job to solve the mystery.

Grabs your camera and get into the paranormal seekers
You must collect diaries and keys, to escape the manor.

Search all dorm and escape from there. Lots of horrors and paranormal activity. There were many paranormal and frightful incidents in the dorm. It can not be said to be a very uncanny place. The dorm has been haunted by a devil. And he does not think good things.Your quest is to escape and finally find a way to banish the ghost.
Solve the mysteries!
